chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}

Goal:
forall (a1 : A) (l1 : list bool) (t1 t : pbtree), inpb t (pbadd a1 t1 l1) -> inpb (pbleaf a1) t \/ inpb t t1

Premises:
Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive inpb : pbtree -> pbtree -> Prop := inpb_leaf : forall t : pbtree, inpb t t | inpb_left : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbleft t1) | inpb_right : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbright t1) | inpb_node_l : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2) | inpb_node_r : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
pbadd = fix pbadd (a : A) (t : pbtree) (l : list bool) {struct l} : pbtree := match l with | [] => pbleaf a | true :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbright (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbright t2 => pbright (pbadd a t2 l1) | pbnode t1 t2 => pbnode t1 (pbadd a t2 l1) end | false :: l1 => match t with | pbleaf _ => pbleft (pbadd a (pbleaf empty) l1) | pbleft t1 => pbleft (pbadd a t1 l1) | pbright t
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
inpb_pbadd : forall (a1 : A) (l1 : list bool) (t1 : pbtree), inpb (pbleaf a1) (pbadd a1 t1 l1)
inpbleaf_pbadd_inv : forall (a1 a2 : A) (a3 : pbtree) (l : list bool), inpb (pbleaf a1) (pbadd a2 a3 l) -> a1 = a2 \/ inpb (pbleaf a1) a3
inpb_node_l : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
inpb_left : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbleft t1)
inpb_right : forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> inpb t (pbright t1)
inpb_node_r : forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> inpb t (pbnode t1 t2)
inpb_ind : forall P : pbtree -> pbtree -> Prop, (forall t : pbtree, P t t) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbleft t1)) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbright t1)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> forall p p0 : pbtree, inpb p p0 -> P p p0
inpb_sind : forall P : pbtree -> pbtree -> SProp, (forall t : pbtree, P t t) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbleft t1)) -> (forall t t1 : pbtree, pbtree -> inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbright t1)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (pbnode t1 t2)) -> forall p p0 : pbtree, inpb p p0 -> P p p0
inpbleaf_eq : forall (a1 a2 a3 : A) (l : list bool), inpb (pbleaf a1) (pbadd a2 (pbleaf a3) l) -> a1 = a2
distinct_pbleaves = fun t : pbtree => forall t0 t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb (pbnode t1 t2) t -> inpb t0 t1 -> inpb t0 t2 -> False : pbtree -> Prop
inpb_ex : forall t : pbtree, exists x : A, inpb (pbleaf x) t
inpb_leaf : forall t : pbtree, inpb t t
in_pbcompute_inpb : forall (t : pbtree) (a : A) (l : list bool), In (a, l) (compute_pbcode t) -> inpb (pbleaf a) t
pbadd_prop2 : forall (a1 : A) (l1 : list bool) (l2 : pbtree), pbfree l1 l2 -> permutation (compute_pbcode (pbadd a1 l2 l1)) ((a1, l1) :: compute_pbcode l2)
in_pbleaf_node : forall (a1 a2 : pbtree) (a3 a4 : A) (l : list bool), ~ inpb (pbnode a1 a2) (pbadd a3 (pbleaf a4) l)
pbadd_prop1 : forall (a1 a2 : A) (l1 : list bool), compute_pbcode (pbadd a1 (pbleaf a2) l1) = [(a1, l1)]
Inductive inb (A : Type) : btree A -> btree A -> Prop := inleaf : forall t : btree A, inb t t | innodeL : forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2) | innodeR : forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2) Arguments inb [A]%type_scope Arguments inleaf _%type_scope Arguments innodeL _%type_scope Arguments innodeR _%type_scope
distinct_pbleaves_pbadd_prop1 : forall (a a1 : A) (l1 : list bool), distinct_pbleaves (pbadd a1 (pbleaf a) l1)
weight_tree_compute : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> (forall a : A, f a = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) -> length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t) m) = weight_tree f t
inpb_trans : forall t1 t2 t3 : pbtree, inpb t1 t2 -> inpb t2 t3 -> inpb t1 t3
innodeL : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
Inductive cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover [t] t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments cover_one _%type_scope Arguments cover_node _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
innodeR : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
inpb_compute_ex : forall (a : A) (p : pbtree), inpb (pbleaf a) p -> exists l : list bool, In (a, l) (compute_pbcode p)
add_frequency_list_in_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a1 a2 : A) (b1 : nat) (l : list (A * nat)), In (a1, b1) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a2 l) -> a1 = a2 \/ In (a1, b1) l
pbfree_pbadd_prop1 : forall (a1 : A) (l l1 : list bool), ~ is_prefix l l1 -> ~ is_prefix l1 l -> pbfree l (pbadd a1 (pbleaf empty) l1)
inpb_dec : forall a b : pbtree, {inpb a b} + {~ inpb a b}
pb_unique_key : forall t : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves t -> unique_key (compute_pbcode t)
distinct_pbleaves_pbleft : forall t : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves t -> distinct_pbleaves (pbleft t)
distinct_pbleaves_pbright : forall t : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves t -> distinct_pbleaves (pbright t)

```coq
```coq
unfold pbadd. intros. induction l; simpl in *; try contradiction.
- apply inpb_leaf.
- destruct t; try contradiction.
  + apply inpb_left; auto.
  + apply inpb_node_l; auto.
  + apply inpb_node_r; auto.
- destruct t; try contradiction.
  + apply inpb_right; auto.
  + apply inpb_node_l; auto.
  + apply inpb_node_r; auto.
Qed.```
